sense.def:
Če nekomu rečemo
‘Be careful’
, ga opozarjamo pred nevarnostjo ali težavo.

seg.quote: Please be careful with the washing machine.

sense.def:
Kdor je
careful
, nekaj počne zelo pazljivo, da bi delo opravil dobro ali pravilno.

seg.quote: This law will encourage more careful driving.
He made a careful copy of the notes.
He walked carefully around the broken glass.
